column8: she was a daughter of marion gros basse and the late gerard landry basse. she was a graduate of imaculatta high school and attended nichols state university for four years. additional survivors include sisters
column9: ilene ann fernandez boudreaux of williamston and janice elizabeth gaskill of easley; niece
column12: jared and brandon gaskill; great-nieces and nephews
column15: logan and valerie. friends and family are invited to attend visitation from 10:00 am to noon monday
column16: june 15 at new beginning lighthouse church of lafitte. the service will follow at noon with burial at st. pius cemetery
